text: Uncle at cashier is very dirty and lack proper etiquette and hygiene, there was a few customers at cashier wanting to make payment and I was in the Q too. While scanning customer items, saw him digging deep into his ear with his finger and then proceed to touch customers items, in the process transferring his gross ear wax onto customer items, it was the grossest thing I've seen a cashier doing in my life. I decided not to make any purchase and decided to exit the store.
Cashier is harsh in her tone when i accidentally gave the wrong amt of money. I'd rather go to the mama shops nearby. I hope a better shop owner will take over the place. Customer service  is bad.

When first opened for business, staff is attentive and serves customers first. Now totally lacking basic customer service. Female staff priorities stacking the cigarettes than serving customers. When she feels like providing customer service, she will say nicely to wait a second and serves you promptly. Otherwise she doesnâ€™t care and make you wait even though they are aware of your presence. Now that they provide Shopee collection point, things goes to another level. They just point to the phone and make you key in your own pin and then you wait while she prioritises stacking the cigarettes. Hopefully they stop being arrogant and ignorant.
Poor service, giving attitude to customer. Always served by the young lady, if got no mood to serve customer by service, kindly change to other job!
Went in wait 3 mins at counter. No one working?
